p: ÅB, CG, AA, PH, MR, MT, and OR designed the mesocosm experiment. CG and MR carried out the contaminant analyses. OR, PH, and CG designed and conducted the microbial sampling. CG and DF carried out BP analyses. HS advised and supported molecular analyses and bioinformatics. ÅB conducted analyses of PP. JR, OR, and ST designed the molecular work. JR performed all molecular analyses, all bioinformatics analyses, and all statistical analyses. OR and ST provided support and supervision during manuscript drafting. JR conducted the manuscript writing and editing. All authors reviewed results and approved the final version of this manuscript.
